pageContext.claim: “So I stayed in the White House and I'll tell you what, I was there, I told my wife go to Florida. Enjoy your Christmas. … I spent my New Year’s all by myself. Don’t cry. It was me and about 500 men and women outside with machine guns. I never saw so many beautiful looking machine guns.”
pageContext.analysis: First lady Melania Trump cut short her trip to Florida to spend Christmas with Trump. She returned to Florida for New Year's Eve while Trump remained in Washington.
